capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm not really sure about Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts. I mean, he was a teacher there for many years, but his behavior towards students often seemed... questionable. He had this whole dark and mysterious persona going on, which made it hard to read him sometimes. But, despite all that, I do know he was indeed affiliated with the school.

Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a bit complicated, to be honest. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and seemed to have a certain... respect for the school, but at the same time, his behavior towards students was often quite harsh and intimidating. He had a very dark past, you know, and it's hard to separate that from his professional life as a teacher. I think he was more of a product of Hogwarts than he ever could have been its greatest asset.
capsules_submitted.reply: i have heard this before. i remember that irma0 mentioned earlier that snape is affiliated with hogwarts.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a bit complicated, to be honest. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and taught some of the most talented students, including Harry Potter himself. But at the same time, his behavior towards Harry was often... let's just say, less than welcoming. He had this whole reputation as being one of the most feared teachers in the school, which can be intimidating, I suppose.
